GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
ACT
No. 4 of 2025
Date of Assent: 8th April, 2025
An Act to provide for offences relating to computers and
computer systems; provide for the protection of persons
against cyber crimes; provide for child online protection;
and provide for matters connected with, or incidental to,
the foregoing.
[ 15th April, 2025
ENACTED by the Parliament of Zambia. Enactment
